p: Although COVID has been a respiratory disease, yet its malevolence seems to have grazed the gastrointestinal (GI) tract too. Samanta et al in a comprehensive review have lucidly presented the GI associations and GI manifestations of Coronavirus. 1 They have done a meticulous job by looking at every aspect including mechanisms of viral entry, the significance of ACE-2 and TMPRSS2 and diarrhea, the impact on natural course of preexisting GI diseases, and the possible methods to break transmission lines.
